description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

This colorless mist has a mild, waxy scent that precedes acute shortness of breath. Creatures that don't need to breathe can still take the poison's damage but are immune to its other effects.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[6d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}, and can't breathe

Stage 2 @Damage[8d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2}, and reduce remaining air by 1 additional round

Stage 3 @Damage[10d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 3}, and reduce remaining air by 2 additional rounds
